content: *pattern is only available from web archive org* this pattern page is a part of the crochet for every room collection this one is in the teen room section color-me-crazy crochet materials bernat satin 100 g/3 5 oz main color mc 04605 sunset 11 balls contrast a 04013 mocha 3 balls size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook
